#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,i,j;
	cin>>t;
	for(i=1 ; i<= t; i++)
	{
		cout<<"Case "<<i<<":"<<endl;
		int n,m;
		cin>>n>>m;
		double cc[n];
		for(int l=0 ; l< n  ; l++)
		{
			double d;
			cin>>cc[l];
		}
		sort(cc,cc+n);
		reverse(cc,cc+n);
		for(int p = 1 ; p <= m  ; p++)
		{
			float change;
			cin>>change;
			//cout<<change<<endl;
			cout<<"Scenario "<<p<<":"<<endl;
			for(j=0 ; j< n ; j++)
			{
				int tttt = 0;
				//cout<<change<<endl;
				while(change+.001>=cc[j])
				{
					change = change - cc[j];
					tttt++;
				}
				if(tttt > 0)
				{		
				if(cc[j]<1)
						printf("%.2f %d\n",cc[j],tttt); 
					else
						cout<<cc[j]<<" "<<tttt<<endl;
					
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
